title: Hypotenuse Length
shortDescription: Write a function that calculates the hypotenuse of a right triangle.
description: Write a function that takes in two integer side lengths of a right triangle and returns the length of the hypotenuse as an integer. For example, if the function recieves 3 and 4, it should return 5. Note that you may use the 'sqrt' function from 'math.h'.
